thread.section_title: Woman staggers away with fractured nose after being beaten up in racist attack – Metro
thread.title: Woman staggers away with fractured nose after being beaten up in racist attack
thread.title_full: Woman staggers away with fractured nose after being beaten up in racist attack

author: Richard Hartley-Parkinson
title: Woman staggers away with fractured nose after being beaten up in racist attack
text:
The woman cups her face after her nose was broken (Picture: West Midlands Police) A woman was left with a fractured nose and cheekbone after she was beaten up in a racist attack by an Asian gang.
The woman was caught on CCTV covering her face as she stumbles out into the street.
Food from the floor really is safe under the 'five second rule' The gang then fought with the 34-year-old’s boyfriend following the attack which happened after a night at the Skydome, Coventry.
She was racially abused by the three men and police have released footage of the incident to try and track the men down.
A spokesman for West Midlands Police said that ‘three men shouted a racist comment at [her]’.
This embed is invalid
‘When she tried to confront them she was assaulted and sustained fractures to her nose and cheekbone.’
Student 'imprisoned, stripped and assaulted' in 'abhorrent' attack A West Midlands Police spokesman added: ‘We have released CCTV and are appealing for information following an assault at Coventry Skydome on December 11, 2016.
‘A 34-year-old woman was walking home from a night out with her partner when a group of three men shouted a racist comment at her.
‘When she tried to confront them she was assaulted and sustained fractures to her nose and cheekbone.’
Anyone with information about the attack is asked to contact PC Chris Parry or call Crimestoppers on 0800 555 111.
